doc.name: Undefined
doc.description:
An actor that produces no outputs or tokens.

In domains such as SR, the output of this actor will never converge to a defined value. This actor is different from the ptolemy.domains.sr.lib.Absent actor, which produces an absent value.
doc.author: Paul Whitaker, Haiyang Zheng
doc.property: The type for the output port. This is a string-valued attribute that defaults to "int".
